howworks.step1: Find the project(s) you want to support.

howworks.step2: Choose the way you want to help: either money or knowledge.
howworks.desc2: The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pit.
howworks.step3: Track and share the impact you created!
howworks.desc3: His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar.
